schema.description: Filter by vault status. Defaults to [draft, active] if not provided. Can be provided multiple times (e.g., ?status=draft&status=active).
Filter by reshare status, when provided. Can be provided multiple times (e.g., ?status=voting&status=signing).

get.description: Get all votes for a reshare
Get a signature request and its metadata by ID

schema.description: Filter by signature status, when provided. Can be provided multiple times (e.g., ?status=voting&status=signing).

post.description: Create a new signature request in a vault.

get.description: Get all possible votes for a signature request, including pending votes and weight per signer.
Get current license information and status
Get current system-wide resource usage compared to license limits

post.description: [TEST-ONLY] Clear usage cache for specific entitlement or all caches
